snippet.title: Slow Mole NES Trailer – Free insane platformer, OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
Slow Mole is a new game for the Nintendo Entertainment System. Playable on modern computers and original hardware. Download the full game free at: https://slowmoledev.itch.io/slow-mole

This trailer is also being turned into an animated film: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-uDzH0V4JZM

If you want to share this video on Facebook you can share the FB-video instead:
https://www.facebook.com/100002573531628/videos/4077108435718234/

Or on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/Checkoofilm/status/1411761191811170304

Visit the Patreon page to learn more about the upcoming cartridge release of Slow Mole +
https://www.patreon.com/erikrosenlund

Game design by Erik Rosenlund 
Music by Linus Rosenlund
Additional assembler coding and hardware design by Kristofer Thorell
Trailer directed and animated by Erik Rosenlund
©Erik Rosenlund 2021

While I'm a long-time an animator and have gained some acclaim for my short films (twice in competition at the Cannes Film Festival), this is my first game. This trailer aims to tell the truth about what it's like to play it. It's not for everyone, but I believe that those who hang in there will find it rewarding. To see more of my short films check the other videos on this channel.
